Show:

tb Class

Extends TbSelector
Defined in: dist/tb/tb.js:194

tb() / new tb() can be used as SELECTOR and CONSTRUCTOR

sample call CONSTRUCTOR: var a = new tb( 'tb_repo_object_namespace' )

sample call SELECTOR: var result = tb( 'div#app' )

for selector functionality see TbSelector object

Constructor

tb

(
  • arguments[0]
  • [arguments[1]]
  • [arguments[2]]
)
Object

Defined in dist/tb/tb.js:194

Parameters:

  • arguments[0] String
    • namespace of class | TbSelector parameter
  • [arguments[1]] optional
    • config data ( if called as constructor )
  • [arguments[2]] optional
    • DOM target or parent tb instance

Returns:

Object:
  • twoBirds Object or TbSelector instance /w results

children

(
  • [pSelector]
  • [pLocalOnly]
)
Object

Defined in dist/tb/tb.js:963

children() method

for each this[0...n] or this as tb() instance,

  • get all direct children of tb object
  • check them against the filter param pSelector
  • return TbSelector result set (unique)

Parameters:

  • [pSelector] Object optional
    • any kind of TbSelector parameter
  • [pLocalOnly] Boolean optional
    • only local children of given tb instance

Returns:

Object:
  • TbSelector instance

(
  • pEventName
  • pHandler
)
Object

Defined in dist/tb/tb.js:752

off() method

for each this[0...n] or this as tb() instance,

  • delete handler from handler array
  • return TbSelector result set (unique)

Parameters:

  • pEventName String
    • name of the handler function
  • pHandler Function
    • the function to be added to the handler array

Returns:

Object:
  • TbSelector instance

(
  • pEventName
  • pHandler
  • [pOnce=false]
)
Object

Defined in dist/tb/tb.js:686

on() method

for each this[0...n] or this as tb() instance,

  • add handler to handler array
  • return TbSelector result set (unique)

Parameters:

  • pEventName String
    • name of the handler function
  • pHandler Function
    • the function to be added to the handler array
  • [pOnce=false] Boolean optional
    • true = remove handler after first call, false = keep handler

Returns:

Object:
  • TbSelector instance

trigger

(
  • pEvent
  • [pEventData]
  • [pBubble=l]
)
Object

Defined in dist/tb/tb.js:537

trigger an event, optionally with data and bubble indicator

Parameters:

  • pEvent String | Object
    • name of event or tb.Event instance or tb.Event instance
  • [pEventData] optional
    • event data, usally an object
  • [pBubble=l] String optional
    • bubbling indicator : 'l' = local, 'u' = up, 'd' = down or any combination

Returns:

Object:
  • (this) -> TbSelector instance or tb object

walkSelector

(
  • pSelectorObject
  • pMethodName
  • [pArguments]
)
Object private

Defined in dist/tb/tb.js:413

walk all pSelector tb objects, call pMethodName on them return a UNIQUE TbSelector result set containing all single results

Parameters:

  • pSelectorObject Object
    • instanceOf TbSelector
  • pMethodName String
    • name of method to call
  • [pArguments] optional
    • arguments

Returns:

Object:

instance of TbSelector
